summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4246 for the improvement of Andover Street, from 24th Avenue South to Empire Way; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 50448, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
